I have 5 VPS remaining with WeLoveServers after transferring one in http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/25352/17-months-6-gb-ram-6gb-swap-8-vcpu-75-gb-ssd-cached-with-only-94

I would like to keep 3-4 next year. So I want to transfer 1 of them which was paid until 01.10.2014 (4 months remaining). 

With $30 paid to my PayPal as a gift you will have 4-months usage and the right to renew it at $44 with WeLoveServers if you want.
